content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1481531722442{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”AC Installations”][vc_column_text]You may purchase the highest rated air conditioner on the market, but without proper installation, it will not get the job done for you. Homeowners sometimes don’t realize that AC installation is not something that can be done by just anyone. If it was, there wouldn’t be an entire HVAC certification association with strict regulations. No matter how superior your AC is, it must be installed correctly by certified professionals to ensure both safety and function.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”What Does Proper Installation Involve?”][vc_column_text]Proper AC installation involves making sure that every part of your air conditioning unit is secure and operating correctly before you start using it. The AC installing professionals must also perform a thorough assessment of the unit’s location before they place it there correctly.

Correct installation will avoid any potential damage or risks and ensure that your air conditioning unit functions at its peak efficiency and productivity. So, it is prudent to invest in proper installation to prevent unforeseen troubles in the long run with your new HVAC.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Why United Home Services is #1 Air Conditioning and Duct Cleaning Company”][vc_column_text]We assure that you will have your new air conditioner installed quickly and correctly the first time. As a family-owned business that has been serving homeowners since 1998 for all their air conditioning and duct cleaning requirements, we continue to train out already skilled technicians so YOU can make the most of their up-to-date industry knowledge.

We understand that quality of installation is just as important as the AC unit itself. Our experienced team of installers is fully equipped to do this job in accordance with the unique requirements of your home. Our team will look at multiple factors before they go ahead with installing your new cooling system. These will include:

  •       The type of insulation in your home
  •       Your home’s square footage
  •       Your location

We know from experience that every installation is different and a one-size-fits-all approach will never work well when it comes to HVAC installation. Our expert AC installation technicians will closely survey the design and size of your home’s ductwork and calibrate your AC’s settings accordingly. They will also make any necessary adjustments to make sure all components are working at optimal levels. 

So, don’t call your neighbor or cousin to help you install an air conditioner simply because “they seem smart with this stuff.” If something goes wrong during the installation process, and your brand-new air conditioner gets damaged, you won’t be able to take advantage of the manufacturer’s guarantee. And worse, it can lead to carbon monoxide leaks without you noticing![/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Cut Your Energy Bills In Half”][vc_column_text]We have tweaked our AC installation process to such perfection that it puts less stress on the air conditioner and significantly reduces the amount of energy needed to run. In other words, you will pay less on your cooling and heating bills.

We have been helping homeowners in Texas, Connecticut, Pennsylvania, Washington, and Maryland since 1998, and we have thousands of satisfied customers to show for it. Our air conditioning, duct cleaning and repair experts can make sure your AC unit functions efficiently and lasts long, all without raising your monthly utilities bill. 

If you want to know how much air conditioning installation, duct cleaning or repair would cost, or you suspect there is something wrong with your AC, contact us for a free estimate.

Here’s what you can expect from us:

  • Fully licensed, insured, and bonded technicians
  • “A+” rating with the Better Business Bureau
  • Prompt services 7 days a week 
  • Affordable prices
  • 100% satisfaction guarantee
  • Perform system installations, routine maintenance, and repairs with little to no physical contact with customers
  • Technicians are always equipped with hand sanitizer, masks, feet covers, and gloves

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Call us at 866-847-7454 or contact us online to learn more about our services or have an air conditioning installation, duct cleaning, or repair technician visit your home today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
